title: PGPD Investigates Fatal Collision in Adelphi
body:
The Collision Analysis and Reconstruction Unit is investigating a fatal crash
in Adelphi. The victim is 26-year-old Jose Hernandez-Rojas of Harriet
Avenue in Baltimore.On April 21, at approximately 4:30 am, patrol
officers responded to the 8500 block of Adelphi Road for a collision involving
a single car.The preliminary investigation reveals the car was
heading northbound on Adelphi Road,
when for reasons which remain under investigation, it left the roadway and
struck multiple trees. The victim was pronounced dead on the scene. There were
no passengers in the car.   Anyone with information is asked to call the
Prince George’s County Police Department’s Collision Analysis and
Reconstruction Unit at 301-731-4422. Callers wishing to remain
anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477);
online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com or the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the
Apple Store or Google Play to download the app to your mobile device).

Prince George's County Police
